original: Ahlberg, Nils Berndt Henning, direktör, Skövde, f. 23/5/93 i Östra Tun-hem, Skarab. 1., av Joel A. o. Emma Carl’S’son. ’ — Ultuna lantbr :’skola. Bokh. på Augerumis gård i Blek. 16-17, förvalt. f. Sv:e’s stärkelseintress. egendom i Ramdala 18-25, h. Sv. Jord-förmedl. 25-34, verkst. dir. i Lsaiks-sonska Boktryckeri A-B i Skövde sed. 35, utg. av Skarab. Läns Annonsblad. V. ordf. i ’S’tyr. f. Skövde elverk, styr led. i Kraft A-B Nykvarn-Tidan, sekr. o. kassör i hush :’säli’sk. kretsavd., hemv :omr :befäl’h. i Skövde, fd. ordf. i Skövde landst :fören., styr :led. i konstfören. m. m. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Skövde Rotaryklubb. Landst. centr:förb. förtj :SM, Skarab. landst :förb. förtj :SM, SkytteGM, Landst. ddr:SM, PetriM, Hemvärnets silverplak.
translated: Ahlberg, Nils Berndt Henning, director, born 23/5/93 in Östra Tun-hem, Skarab. Co., son of Joel A. and Emma Carl’S’son. Graduate of Ultuna Agricultural School. Worked as a bookkeeper at Augerumis farm in Blekinge 1916-1917, managed Swedish starch property in Ramdala 1918-1925, Swedish land-agent 1925-1934, managing director of Lsaiks-sonska Printing Works A-B in Skövde since 1935, publisher of Skaraborg County Advertiser. Vice-chairman of the board of Skövde Electric Company, board member of Kraft A-B Nykvarn-Tidan, secretary and treasurer of the local branch of the Domestic Science Association, home guard commander in Skövde, former chairman of the Skövde County Association, board member of the Art Association, etc. Member of the Freemasons and Skövde Rotary Club. Awarded the Order of the Polar Star by the County Council Central Association, the Order of the Polar Star by the Skaraborg County Council, the Shooting-Silver Medal, the County Council's Golden Medal, the Petri Medal, and the Home Guard's Silver Plaque.
